languages.text: "Идира... перестань корить себя. Твои предсказания всегда были... расплывчаты. Даже если бы и услышала — кто бы из нас понял, что беда грозит именно Леди Теодоре?"
"Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"
languages.original_text: "Идира... перестань корить себя. Твои предсказания всегда были... расплывчаты. Даже если бы и услышала — кто бы из нас понял, что беда грозит именно Леди Теодоре?"

languages.text: “伊迪拉……别再自责了，你的预言一直都很……模糊不清。即使你真的听见了那些声音，我们之中又有谁会想到，西奥多拉夫人竟然会遇到危险呢？”
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

traits.locale_text: “伊迪拉……别再自责了，你的预言一直都很……模糊不清。即使你真的听见了那些声音，我们之中又有谁会想到，西奥多拉夫人竟然会遇到危险呢？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Idira... Cessez donc de vous fustiger ainsi. Vos divinations ont toujours été pour le moins... vagues. Et même si vous l'aviez en effet entendu, qui aurait pu se douter que dame Théodora elle-même était en péril ? »
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

traits.locale_text: « Idira... Cessez donc de vous fustiger ainsi. Vos divinations ont toujours été pour le moins... vagues. Et même si vous l'aviez en effet entendu, qui aurait pu se douter que dame Théodora elle-même était en péril ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Idira ... hört auf, Euch selbst zu kasteien. Eure Vorhersagen waren schon immer ... vage. Selbst, wenn Ihr es gehört hättet — wer von uns hätte erkannt, dass es Lady Theodora war, die in Gefahr ist?"
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

traits.locale_text: "Idira ... hört auf, Euch selbst zu kasteien. Eure Vorhersagen waren schon immer ... vage. Selbst, wenn Ihr es gehört hättet — wer von uns hätte erkannt, dass es Lady Theodora war, die in Gefahr ist?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラ…自分を非難するのはおやめなさい。あなたの予言はいつだって…曖昧です。たとえ聞こえたとしても…私たちの誰が、その予言がレディ・シオドーラの危機だと思えたでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ…自分を非難するのはおやめなさい。あなたの予言はいつだって…曖昧です。たとえ聞こえたとしても…私たちの誰が、その予言がレディ・シオドーラの危機だと思えたでしょう？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Idira... deje de castigarse. Sus predicciones siempre han sido... vagas. Aunque hubiera oído algo... ¿quién de nosotros podría haberse dado cuenta de que era lady Theodora quien corría peligro?».
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

traits.locale_text: «Idira... deje de castigarse. Sus predicciones siempre han sido... vagas. Aunque hubiera oído algo... ¿quién de nosotros podría haberse dado cuenta de que era lady Theodora quien corría peligro?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"

languages.text: "İdira, kendini harap etme. Kehanetlerin her zaman... Muğlaktı. Olacakları işitsen bile, tehlikede olanın Leydi Theodora olduğunu hangimiz anlayabilirdi ki?"
languages.original_text: "Idira... stop castigating yourself. Your soothsayings have always been... vague. Even if you had heard — who among us would have realised that it was Lady Theodora who was in peril?"
